page.title: 10SECTION 4 - POOLEY BRIDGE
page.content: RECREATION - Sailing, fishing, swimming, canoeing, windsurfing, fellwalking. RELIGION - Only place of worship Church of England. Vicar resident in Pooley Bridge, also serving Barton & Martindale. TOURISM - Tourist industry equal to farming. l caravan & tenting site. 5 bed & breakfast houses. All lake & river pursuits except water skiing. There is a speed limit of l0 miles per hour on Ullswater. Fell walking. TRADE - 5 shops, l general store and Post Office, open all year, l sailing equipment shop, open summer months, l gift shop with crafts, open summer months, l hairdresser's & toy shop open summer months. l Souvenier gifts & snack bar open summer months. l caravan site with shop.
